Bash(git -C "E:/M.Y/GIAIC-Hackathons/Evolution-of-Todo" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Add Phase 2 Architecture Decision Records \(ADRs\)

Created 4 ADRs to formalize key architectural decisions from /sp.clarify:

- ADR-004: HTTP-Only Cookie JWT Strategy
  Secure JWT storage in httpOnly cookies with middleware extraction

- ADR-005: Next.js Server Actions as Data Layer  
  Use Server Actions for mutations, revalidatePath for cache invalidation

- ADR-006: SQLModel with Alembic for Migrations
  Alembic for schema evolution, no create_all\(\) in production

- ADR-007: Brownfield Isolation Strategy
  Port logic from Phase 1, do not import directly from phase-1-console/

Updated plan.md with ADR reference table.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
